alert.note: Alert for Bayamon (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued January 11 at 9:50PM AST by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AST TONIGHT... ...REPLACES FLASH FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...Bayamon. * WHEN...Until midnight AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 937 PM AST, although the heavy rain has ended, showers with light to moderate rains will affect the area. Flood waters have not receded in some areas. Municipal emergency managers are still conducting recovery efforts. Between 2 and 7 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to a quarter of an inch are possible over the area. This additional rain could aggravate any ongoing flooding.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
